item.title: Hitachi ZX470 Cylinder Rebuild Complete
item.description: The full rebuild of a Hitachi ZX470 cylinder reaches its final stage, showing the results of detailed workshop work. What does a successful rebuild really depend on?

media:content.media:title: Hitachi ZX470 Cylinder Rebuild Complete
media:content.media:description: The full rebuild of a Hitachi ZX470 cylinder reaches its final stage, showing the results of detailed workshop work. What does a successful rebuild really depend on?

item.title: Removing a Stubborn Gland on a CAT 24M
item.description: Watch the careful attempt to remove a seized gland from a large CAT 24M motor grader cylinder without causing damage. How much patience does a job like this require?

item.title: Repairing a Damaged Mining Truck Cylinder
item.description: A busted mining truck cylinder barrel gets a second life through careful machining and repair work. Can precision restore parts built for extreme conditions?

item.title: Excavator Repair Time in the Workshop
item.description: This video follows a hands-on excavator repair, focusing on diagnosis, machining, and practical problem-solving. What goes into keeping heavy equipment running reliably?

item.title: Can This Massive Cylinder Be Taken Apart?
item.description: A close look at the process of disassembling a large industrial cylinder, step by step and without shortcuts. What’s the safest way to tackle components this size?

item.title: Shop-Made Tools: A Custom Bearing Puller
item.description: See how a custom bearing puller is designed and built using simple shop tools. This practical approach shows problem-solving in action and highlights when making your own tool makes sense. Could this be useful in your workshop?

item.title: Meet MOAC: The Mother of All Cutters
item.description: Get a closer look at MOAC, a heavy-duty cutting tool designed for precision machining and demanding workshop tasks. This video breaks down how it works and what sets it apart. Could this be the ultimate cutter for tough jobs?

item.title: Engine Teardown for a Franna Crane
item.description: We begin a careful engine teardown as part of a Franna crane project, examining components to understand wear, faults, and next repair steps. What’s the first thing you would inspect during a teardown?

item.title: Fitting The Nut In Hydraulic Cylinder Rod
item.description: The team fits and secures the nut onto a hydraulic cylinder rod, ensuring proper alignment and a precise fit for reliable operation.

item.title: We Finished Building the Fume Extraction System!
item.description: The team completes their custom fume extraction system and puts it into operation, improving airflow and creating a safer workshop environment.

item.title: Restoring Big Excavator Arm & Bucket!
item.description: The team repairs and restores a heavily worn excavator arm and bucket, rebuilding critical areas to get the equipment ready for demanding work again.

item.title: Shop-Made Tools: Building a Fume Extraction System
item.description: The team designs and builds a custom fume extraction system for the workshop, improving air quality and safety during welding and machining work.

item.title: The moment of truth! Will our big lathe work correctly and be back in action?
item.description: After servicing and adjustments, the team tests the big lathe to see if it’s running correctly and ready to return to full operation.

item.title: This Polishing Drive Wheel Had Some Hidden Problems
item.description: During inspection and repair, unexpected issues are uncovered inside a polishing drive wheel, revealing why careful teardown and diagnosis matter in heavy machinery work.

item.title: Sawmill Drive Roller | Machining & Broachin
item.description: The team machines and broaches a sawmill drive roller, showing the precision work required to produce a durable, high-performance component.

item.title: Making a Shop-Made Rolling Tool
item.description: The team designs and builds a custom rolling tool in the workshop, showing the machining and assembly needed to create a practical piece of equipment.

item.title: A Guide to Repairing a Damaged Hydraulic Cylinder
item.description: A step-by-step look at how a damaged hydraulic cylinder is inspected, disassembled, and repaired to restore proper function and reliability.

item.title: The ultimate test of a heavy-duty tool post grinder
item.description: The team puts a heavy-duty tool post grinder to the test in the workshop, showing its performance, precision, and capability under real machining conditions.

item.title: Franna Crane Project: Custom Drive Coupling
item.description: The team fabricates a custom drive coupling for the Franna crane, machining each piece to precise measurements to ensure a perfect fit and smooth operation.

item.title: Brake Repair & Service of Our Yale 35U Forklift
item.description: The team services the brakes on a Yale 35U forklift, inspecting components, replacing worn parts, and getting the machine ready for safe, reliable operation.
